summary: A TensorFlow Keras layer that extracts a single fixed‑size vector from transformer sequence hidden states using configurable pooling strategies (last token, first token, mean, specific token index, or attention) and optional linear projection, dropout, and activation.
business_intent: Provides a reusable component for downstream tasks (e.g., classification, regression) to obtain a compact representation of sequence outputs, simplifying model construction and fine‑tuning in TensorFlow pipelines.
